title: fat_mat_tableize.py
description: Make tables for AFNI group analysis programs from 3dNetCorr (*.netcc) and 3dTrackID (*.grid) outputs, with optional additional subject information from CSV files.

output_table.title: Table File
output_table.description: Table file usable in AFNI group analysis programs.

output_log.title: Log File
output_log.description: Log file reporting inputs, matching, and aspects of creating the table file.
